name: pairdrop
description: PairDrop is a self-hosted AirDrop-like file transfer tool using WebRTC. It allows fast device-to-device sharing over your own network without third-party services.
features: WebRTC file transfer: Peer-to-peer sharing using WebRTC for fast, direct transfers without server intermediaries
Cross-platform compatibility: Works across desktop and mobile browsers on any operating system
Local network discovery: Automatically detects nearby devices on the same network for instant pairing
No file size limits: Transfer files of any size without cloud storage restrictions or upload limits
End-to-end encryption: All transfers are encrypted during transmission for privacy between sender and receiver
Text and link sharing: Share clipboard text, URLs, and messages alongside files for quick information exchange
Progressive web app: Install as PWA on mobile devices for app-like experience with offline capabilities
No account required: Start sharing immediately without registration for quick transfers and guest access
Room codes: Create private rooms with custom codes to connect devices across different networks securely
